meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4377.

td.p: Max Siegel, from Goldens Bridge, New York
Miri Baker, a ten-year-old from Warner Robins, Georgia

tr.td: THE 1900s
WE WANT SECONDS
MY AUNTIE THE POET

EASY SPANISH
